attributes.action: Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports at all
attributes.additional_details: This is against basic human rights and the NHS Constitution of "Right To Choose".
attributes.background: We want the Government to commit to not rolling out any e-vaccination status/immunity passport to the British public. Such passports could be used to restrict the rights of people who have refused a Covid-19 vaccine, which would be unacceptable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
